== Avinissery (CT) (627854) ==

Avinissery (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 4.69 sq. km. and harbouring 3302 households with total population of 13983 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 289 km. Male population is 6833 and female population is 7150. Scheduled Caste population is 1036 and Scheduled Tribes population is 26. Census Location Code of the town is 627854<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 80 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 12 km.
